lineText.text: On Grenade Charge: Grants Chaotic Exchanger.
Grenade Hits return between 15% to 85% Grenade Energy. (RNG oof)
Charged Vortex Grenade can proc twice if enemies get hit by the initial explosion and the last few ticks.
While within 15 metres of an enemy, Multi-Dodge Ready appears on the Buff list.
After Dodging within 15 metres of an Enemy:
Can dodge up to 6 times per activation.
Multi-Dodge Dodges are unaffected by Mods that activate on Class Ability Use, alongside Winter's Shroud.
Effect immediately ends if you are over 15 metres away from an Enemy while Multi-Dodge is active.
Grants Shielded buff and applies 40 Stacks of Slow to Combatants within 7 metres.
Shielded lasts 20 seconds and grants a 100HP Overshield.
Shielded also refreshes on damage taken, prevents sprinting, double jumping, and sliding.
While Shielded is active, you cannot regain Class Ability Energy.
Shoulder Charges deal more damage if used midair.
Gain Invisibility on Powered Melee Kill. (Longer on Finishers)
Heals for X on Powered Melee Kill. (Stronger on Finishers)
During slide after sprinting for at least 1.5 seconds:
Generate a 180Â° frontal shield that reflects damage and projectiles.
Fusion Grenades have Fastball intrinsically and detonate on impact.
Kills with Fusion Grenades grant Grenade Energy.
25% for Minors | 50% for Majors | 100% for Guardians & Bosses
Grants Burning Fists on Melee Kill.
Burning Fists lasts 5 seconds and grants Bonus Melee Damage.
Scatter Grenades track enemies within 2 metres
Tripmine Grenades are enhanced and have Fastball intrinsically.
X% Bigger Radius, with no Damage Falloff.
Last 30 seconds (10 -> 30) and have 100HP with 50% Damage Resist.
Ability Damage recharges 33% of Grenade Ability.
Damage Increase until no longer critical.
Refreshes sidearm magazine. (Generates ammo if reserves are empty)
100 Handling to Sidearm Stow and Ready speed.
Grants an extra Smoke Bomb Charge.
Cloaking allies grants 50% Melee Energy per ally.
Damage Resistance on any Invisible effects. Applies to teammates made invisible.
If your Defensive Strike Melee Ability is Charged:
Shotgun Kills activate Defensive Strike and consume your Melee Energy.
Shotgun Final Blows restore Melee Ability Energy.
Grants 100 Handling (w/ 0.95x Animation Duration Multiplier), 100 Reload, and 50 Mobility.
Hits grant Synapse Junctions for 5 seconds. Stacks up to 3x
x1 = 13.5% Damage Increase and X% Slower Passive Super Drain
x2 = 28.8% Damage Increase and X% Slower Passive Super Drain
x3 = 46.2% Damage Increase and X% Slower Passive Drain
25% Chance per Enemy hit with Arcbolt Grenade to recharge your Grenade Ability
Arcbolt Grenades chain up to 5 times (from 4)
Receiving or Dealing Melee Damage grants Cross Counter for 3 seconds or until Melee Hit.
Cross Counter grants 200% increased Melee Damage and heals for XHP on Melee Hit.
One-Two Punch's bonus is reduced to 80% if Cross Counter is active.
Melee Kills, as well as Finishers weaken (1.3x Debuff) and blind.
Duration and Range are dependant on Enemy Rank.
Finishers add 5 seconds to Duration. Bosses are not finishable.
Shift has a distance of 10 metres, and renders you completely invisible except for a trail for the duration of the shift.
Dodging grants Light Shift buff for 10 seconds.
[PVE] Light Shift grants a 10% Damage Increase to Slowed/Frozen targets, as well as granting 10% Damage Increase to Arc Weapons.
Dodge does not recharge while Light Shift buff is active.
Taking damage highlights the enemy that caused it for 8 seconds.
Killing the targeted enemy grants Vengeance for 6 seconds.
Damage Resist to Guardians inside your Rift.
Dearly Departed grants 55% Class Ability Energy.
Buff lasts until no longer Critical.
Spawns a Healing Rift for 15 seconds.
If Shoulder Charge Melee Ability is Charged:
Slowly grants 75 HP Overshield over 5 seconds after sprinting for 0.5 seconds
Overshield disappears instantly when not sprinting.
Recharges 50% of Shoulder Charge ability on Shoulder Charge Hit.
Shoulder Charge prerequisites sprinting for at least 1.5 seconds
Includes Seismic Strike, Ballistic Slam, Hammer Strike, Shield Bash
Does not Stack with Top Tree Striker
100% Increased Grenade and Melee Recharge Speed.
Additive to Focused Breathing's 3% Class Ability per Second
Standing in a Rift creates Noble Seekers every 5 seconds that seeks out allies within 35 metres and apply a buff depending on the type of Rift.
Each time a Noble Seeker applies a buff, the Rift gets extended by 5 seconds.
Healing Rift Noble Seekers heal allies for 75HP and begins Health Regeneration.
Empowering Rift Noble Seekers grant a
Aiming Down Sights while Airborne grants Tome of Dawn.
Reduces Accuracy Penalty while Airborne by X% (Needs testing)
Reduces Flinch received (Equivalent to an Unflinching Mod)
Lasts for 2.8 seconds. Hits refresh Y seconds. (Needs testing)
20% Grenade Energy per Weapon Damage Instance while Empowered (0.5s Cooldown)
100% Class Ability Energy on Grenade Kill
Empowered is either Well of Radiance, Empowering Rift or Guiding Flame.
Casting Fists of Havoc grants Resolute.
Resolute is a 75HP Overshield that negates Precision Damage.
Overshield can be refreshed by unequipping and equipping but who is gonna do that to be quite honest.
Daybreak Kills spawn both an Empowering and Healing Rift on Enemy Death Location.
Solar Weapon Kills grant X% Class Ability Energy.
While your Class Ability Energy is Full:
Weapon Kills consume your Class Ability Energy and spawn a Healing+Empowering Rift at the Target's Location.
When surrounded by at least X enemies within Y metres, gain Class Ability Recharge
damage on a X metre radius.
+32 Reload and Handling stat to all weapons. Caps out at 100.
(Base Melee Range is 5.25 metres, 6.25 for Warlocks)
Biotic Enhancements increases Melee and Super damage for 8 seconds.
Increases Melee Lunge distance to 7 metres.
Melee Hits grant Stacks of Fury Conductors.
Receiving melee damage unleashes an Arc Explosion with a radius of 5 metres.
Arc Explosion deals 22% of your Melee Damage per Stack of Fury Conductors.
Fury Conductors grants 33%|55%|70% Damage Resistance to Melee Attacks depending on number of Stacks.
All Stacks disappear upon receiving melee damage or after 10 seconds of not Meleeing.
Powered Void Melee Kills grant 20% Super Energy
Sentinel Shield's Shield Throws regenerate 10% Super Energy
Kills during Stormtrance grant Stacks of Ascending Amplitude for 8 seconds.
Ascending Amplitude increases Stormtrance Damage by 10% per Stack, caps at 10 Stacks which provides a 100% damage increase.
Refunds up to 50% of Super Energy based on Enemy Kills.
Guarding with Sentinel/Banner Shield blinds enemies within 7 metres for 5 seconds.
Any Ward of Dawn that you create grants Starless Night, which gives a 65HP Overshield to any ally that enters.
Overshield persists for up to 6 seconds.
Enemies that enter your Ward of Dawn are also blinded for 5 seconds.
Weapon Kills while inside an Empowering or Healing Rift grant Blood Magic
Blood Magic stops the timer of the Rift thus extending its duration.
5 seconds of per Kill. Caps at 15 seconds.
Bows are able to hold perfect draws indefinitely.
Blade Barrage Hits and Kills refund Super Energy.
Refund Amount depends on Kills and Hits, as well as Enemy Rank.
0.9% Melee & Grenade Ability Recharge per Second
4.25% Melee & Grenade Ability Recharge per Second
Generates a Healing Pulse on Barricade Cast which heals both the user and allies.
Healing Pulse heals for the highest between 58 HP OR to 130HP over 12 metres.
Supers generate 1 extra Orb of Power.
Refreshes 10% of Readied Auto Rifle/Machine Gun magazine every 1.5 seconds.
100 Handling Ready Speed and Y% Accuracy Increase on Draw for X seconds.
After readying a Hand Cannon with a Full Magazine that deals Kinetic Damage or matches your Subclass:
60% Increased damage per Hit for 5 seconds. Maxes out at 600% after 10 Hits.
Eriana's Vow has a reduced effectiveness of 30% Damage Increase per Hit.
After the Buff runs out, you swap weapons, or firing after the 5 second period:
You cannot gain stacks or reacquire the buff for 10 seconds.
Deadfall returns Ability Energy per Enemy Tethered.
X% Super Energy. Max of 50% Super Energy.
Moebius Quiver can fire 2 more Arrows per Super Activation.
Triple Jump = 6 metres -> 7 metres for First Jump (16% higher)
9 metres -> 11 metres for Second Jump (22% higher)
Jump Distance Increase: (Includes innate 6.25% faster sprint)
Maxes out Sword's Guard Resistance, Efficiency, and Endurance.
Perfectly timed blocks heal for 80(?) HP.
Aggressive Frame Swords grant 95% Damage Resistance.
Sword Energy does not decay from blocking damage or holding guard.
Assault Barricade has reduced health and duration, but enables you and your allies to shoot through it.
Drops a Parting Gift that explodes and deals 120 Damage over 7.5 metres with a 1(?) second fuse.
Parting Gift has an additional effect based on Subclass:
Slows for 2 seconds and refreshes existing Slow Stacks. Does not apply Slow Stacks.
Suppress for 7 seconds [Does not apply to Guardians in Super]
On Ability Usage: Gain Empowered for other abilities.
Grants a 30% Ability Damage Increase and 40% Barricade Health Increase per Stack.
5% Melee and Grenade Energy per Second
Unpowered Melee Hits also proc Empowered.
Chaos Reach recovers 10% Super Charge on hit. 0.75s Cooldown.
Can increase Super Duration by up to 100%.
Weapons Kills with a Matching Subclass Element grant Stacks of Death Throes.
Each Stack of Death Throes grants 20% faster Grenade Recharge and 20% Grenade Damage Increase.
Allies within 18(?) metres receive Feel The Flame.
Feel the Flame grants 6x (verify!) faster Grenade Recharge for (2 * Stacks) seconds.
Increases the duration of Invisibility effects.
Regenerates 4% of Melee Ability per second.
Additional Enemies within 15 metres will instead increase it to 4.66% | 6.9% | 8.88%
Restores Super Energy % on Heavy Attack based on the amount of Spectral Blade Kills.
Super Energy % gains based on kills
Enemy explodes in an elemental explosion of your currently selected Light Subclass.
Explosion Radius and Falloff Distance scale with your Weapon's Range Stat.
Kills while inside a Well of Radiance return Super Energy, up to 50%.
Each Kill grants 1.5% less than the previous.
Unleashes a Solar Wave that returns back to the Barricade after 18.5 metres.
Solar Kills refresh 25% of Class Ability Energy.
Solar Kills have a chance of granting 1 Stack of Firewalker [1 to 3 Kills, average of 2]
Being Frozen grants 1 Stack of Firewalker
Firewalker increases Weapon Damage depending on Stacks and lasts 10 seconds.
Slow Stacks and Duration are halved.
Receive no damage from Stasis Breakout.
Stasis Breakout also creates a burst of Solar Energy with a 9m radius, dealing 105 damage.
Weapon Kills with a Matching Subclass Element grant a buff, depending on whether Super is charged or not.
Energy Siphon for 2 seconds. (Essentially a Cooldown)
per additional kill) of Absorption Cells, granting a 20% Damage Increase for Weapons Matching your Subclass Element.
Absorption Cells maxes out at a
Absorption Cells disappears on Weapon Swap.
Marks enemies for 5 seconds after hovering reticle near them for 1 second.
HP: Grants a 1% Damage Increase per percent below 30%
Damage Increase applies to both abilities and weapons.
Only one shot per Golden Gun activation.
Grants 500% more damage to Golden Gun.
(37% more compared to Line 'Em Up x3)
Returns 33% of Super Energy on Kill.
Radar remains active while Aiming Down Sights.
Grants Enhanced Radar. (Posseses 12 sectors instead of 6)
Grants Warlord's Sigil on Melee Kill
Warlord's Sigil lasts 5 seconds and grants Bonus Melee Damage
Heal for XHP and constantly regenerate XHP/s.
Solar Grenades have Fastball intrinsically and last twice as long (5 -> 10 seconds).
Powered Melee Kills grant 5 seconds of Sunbracers Ready.
Throwing or consuming a grenade while Sunbracers Ready is active grants Sunbracers buff, granting unlimited Solar Grenades for 5 seconds.
Burns last X seconds longer and grant X% Melee Energy on Solar Burn DoT
Solar Burns add Rites of Ember debuff, which amplify the damage dealt by Daybreak.
Only Daybreak projectiles, Igniting Touch, and Phoenix Dive work.
Holding [Grenade] summons a Sentient Arc Soul for 20 seconds.
Sentient Arc Souls target enemies up to 29 metres away, shooting an improved burst of 6 homing bolts that deal
If the Sentient Arc Soul hits during a burst, gain 4.5% Grenade Energy.
Standing in an Arc Soul Rift refreshes the duration of Sentient Arc Soul.
Sun Warrior buff from Sunspots lasts twice as long (5 ->10 seconds)
Grants you and allies within 15 metres a 100HP Overshield for 10 seconds.
Leaving the 15 metre radius removes Overshield
If the wearer loses Overshield, so too does everyone else.
Heals for XHP and grants Y Recovery for X seconds after getting a Weapon Kill with a Matching Subclass Element.
No Accuracy Penalty while Airborne when Hipfiring in Lift.
Decreases SMG ADS penalty from 25% to 9%
After sprinting for 1.5 seconds, gain Linear Actuators for 7 seconds.
Linear Actuators applies Shocked for 2 seconds on enemy, which releases an Arc static charge that chains when another enemy is within 20 metres. Shocked is refreshed on chain.
Reduces Blink charge cooldown by ~16% on average.
While inside a Rift or Well of Radiance.
+100 Reload with 0.9x Duration Scale to all Guardians inside.
While inside an Empowering Rift or Well of Radiance.
The higher your Range Stat, the lower the Multiplier.
This is a multiplier to effective range.
Powered Melee and Finisher Kills unleash an Elemental explosion, centered on the enemy.
Explosion Damage and Radius depends on Enemy Rank.
Heals up to Max Critical Health on Kill.
Regenerates 5% Barricade, Grenade, and Melee Energy on taking Damage.
(I think it requires a minimum amount of damage in one hit to proc?, probably has cooldown)
Arc Melee Kills fully recharge Melee Ability and begins Health Regeneration
Knockout counts as an Arc Melee Kill
Weighted Throwing Knives gain a second bounce with greatly increased tracking.
After 3 Precision Hits within 2.5 seconds of each: Gain Strengthened Throwing Knife.
Additional Precision Hits increase duration by 5 seconds each.
increased damage and stagger unstoppable champions.
Landing a Knife Hit consumes Strengthened Throwing Knife.
Grants an additional Melee Charge to Solar Subclasses.
(Eg: Both are recharged on Gambler's Dodge)
Poison deals up to 680% the total damage of Melee Damage
Initial Poison tick deals 18% of Melee damage, while the last tick deals 54%.
Each successive Poison tick deals 9% more damage. Lasts 19 ticks.
Poisoned enemies spread the poison on death on a 3 metre radius.
Skip Grenades spawn 1 more drone (4 -> 5) and chase enemies much more aggressively.
Hits with Skip Grenades grant X% Grenade Energy.
Highlights enemies below 33% HP in a red outline, and Enemy Guardians with Fully-charged Supers in a yellow outline.
Passively regenerates 0.6% of Grenade, Melee, and Class Ability Energy per second.
(Stasis Grenades recharge at .45% Ability Energy per Second)
No, it is not "+30 to all your Abilities", and yes, it scales past 100 because it's a % per second.
3.65% Grenade and Melee Recharge per second
Massively Increases Damage Resist during Nova Bomb
Nova Bomb returns Super Energy on Kills
Arc Ability Kills grant Conduction Tines for 7 seconds. Stacks up to 3x.
1.5% Grenade and Melee Ability per Second | 0.45% Super Ability per Second
4% Grenade and Melee Ability per Second | dunno about super
6.3% Grenade and Melee Ability per Second | 1.7% Super Ability per Second | 66% Slower Super Drain
Super Drain affects every Roaming Super BUT Chaos Reach.
Applies Misdirection to enemies within 22 metres.
disorients minors and elites for 5 seconds.
warps audio and removes radar for 5 seconds, as well as briefly blinding.
Increased Super Energy from Orbs of Power.
Picking up an Orb of Power grants 1 Overcharge Stack.
Each Overcharge Stacks grants increased Super Damage, up to 1.7x.
Casting Super while Overcharged heals you for X HP
Casting Super while at 8 Overcharge Stacks grants you a Y HP Overshield for 16 seconds.
Powered Melee Hit instantly casts Smoke Bomb.
Standing in the Smoke Bomb's Cloud grants Truesight for 3 seconds, allowing you to see enemy outlines through walls from up to 64 metres away.
Fully restores Health, Grenade, Melee, and Class Ability Energy on Super Cast.
Allies within 18(?) metres recharge 0.25% of their Class Ability per Second.
Move forward at 90% your speed while blocking with Sentinel Shield.
Converts damage into Super Energy after Super ends, up to 50%.
Overshields prevent damage into Super Energy conversion.
Don't stand in a Well of Radiance.
Overshield Duration scales with Thundercrash distance, up to a max of 20 seconds.
Blocking with Whirlwind Guard doesn't consume extra Super Energy.
Can deactivate Arc Staff at any time to preserve a portion of unspent Super Energy.
Grenade Kills grant stacking damage increases and Handling for 10 seconds.
(Full magazine reload is faster with the perk)
For the first bullet only, and after a 3.1s after not firing:
20 AA, 20 Range, 5% Damage Falloff Distance Increase, -5% Accuracy Cone, -10% Accuracy Cone Growth
Shotguns do not receive the Damage Falloff Distance Increase.
Spawns a Stasis Crystal on Enemy Death Location.
Decreases Draw Time by 30% for 3 seconds.
Perfect Draws are not accurate with the Draw Time Stat, you can be up to 40ms too early and still achieve them.
Increased Reload Speed. Effect increases linearly as health decreases, up to 100 Reload Speed with 0.9x Duration Multiplier
Precision Hits grant Rapid Hit Stacks, granting 5/27/32/40/54 Reload Speed and 5/10/15/20/23 Stability for 2 seconds.
(Verify the actual ramp up on stability, max of 23 is accurate)
30 Handling, 20 Stability, -40% Accuracy Cone Size, -17% Accuracy Cone Growth, -80% Recoil Yaw (Horizontal Recoil)
15% Increased damage and sets Forward Movement Speed to 9 metres / second (Max Sprint Speed)
Increases Sword Lunge Distance to X meters.
On Weapon Ready within 3 seconds of getting a Kill with a Different Weapon:
20% Damage Increase, and 15 Handling for 7 seconds.
Headshots mid burst after hitting at least one bodyshot receive an 8% Precision Damage Increase.
Damage Increase On Elemental Kills, and for one shot:
Passively grants 10 Aim Assist, and 3% Reduced Movement Speed Penalty from ADS and Strafing.
Weapon Kills increase Reload Speed for 3.5 seconds.
100 Ready/Stow Handling for 1 second, or until ADS.
50% Damage Increase, X Reload Speed, and 30 Handling for 5 seconds OR 3 shots.
If Heavy Attack consumes the last Ammo:
67% Damage Increase to Grounded Heavy Attack.
Sets the Lightweight Frame Submachine Gun's Damage Profile into that of a Precision Frame.
Prevents Radar Ping from shooting, X Reload Speed (with Scalar!), and increases hold time by 25%
X% Faster Projectile Velocity (Varies between Weapon Type apparently?)
Stacks with ADS Scalar effects, such as Helmet Targeting mods, Threat Detector, and Dragon's Shadow.
Fully refreshes weapon (Held or Stowed), 45 Handling, 5% Faster Swap Speed.
On Reload, within 3.8 seconds of a Weapon Kill:
Combines the Penetration from Armor-Piercing Rounds, the Ricochet aspect of Ricochet Rounds, and the Flinch Increase from High-Caliber Rounds.
Also increases the Damage Falloff by 10%, identically to the old Ricochet Rounds.
On Precision Kill: 10 Range per Stack. Max of 3 Stacks.
On Non-Precision Kill: Removes a Range Stack and grants -X% Accuracy Cone Growth, -Y% Accuracy Cone Size, and 30 Stability if there are no active Range Stacks left.
100 Handling, 100 Reload, 100 Aim Assist, massively decreased flinch received, increased accuracy, stronger scope highlight, and enables radar while ADS.
Passively grants 18 Handling and 18 Reload Speed
Explosion releases 8 Cluster Bombs, which further increase the effective damage radius and the overall damage.
Each Cluster Bomb deals 3% of the Explosive Damage.
Gradually during Sustained Fire, maxing its effect after 0.6 seconds:
Greatly increases Accuracy, and adds up to 9 Stability.
Accuracy improvement is greater than initial accuracy, but isn't perfectly accurate while Airborne.
Accuracy increase is gradual, almost completely negating the effects of bloom.
25% Damage Increase and causes enemies to explode on death.
Reloads 10% of Magazine Capacity From Reserves. Maxes out at Double Magazine Capacity.
(Can go above double magazine, equal to (2x Magazine Size + Ammo Gain - 1))
63 Reload Speed with 0.9x Multiplier for 6 seconds.
15% Damage Increase against Minibosses, Champions, Vehicles, and Bosses.
40% to 50% Damage Increase for Primary Weapons | 10% to 20% Damage Increase for Special Weapons
Stronger Flinch on Combatants. Allows Primaries to affect higher ranked enemies and consistently stunlock Minors.
Varies between Archetypes, from 6% to 11% Increased Flinch received.
Kills increase Accuracy and Stability while improving vertical recoil for 5.5 seconds.
1x = -15% Accuracy Cone Growth, 15 Stability and ~20 Recoil Direction.
2x = -30% Accuracy Cone Growth, 30 Stability, and ~40 Recoil Direction.
For 4 seconds after switching to Fusion Rifle:
All weapons get relaoded from reserves.
As Magazine goes below 50% until empty:
25% to 50% increased Accuracy and up to 20 stability.
On Elemental/Barrier or Guardian Shield Break:
Weakens the enemy, granting a 50% Kinetic Damage Increase for 5.5 seconds.
Stacks with other Debuffs, as it is a Weapon Perk.
Powered Swords gain 1 Ammo after 3 Hits within 2(?) seconds of each.
20% Damage Increase and 100ms Faster Charge Time.
Buff can expire mid-burst if you don't immediately start charging.
While within X metres of 2+ Allies:
13.8% Precision Damage Increase on Sniper Rifles.
5.7% Precision Damage Increase on Machine Guns.
Using your Grenade Ability changes the Weapon Element to match your selected Subclass until stowed.
1.2x Aim Assist and Reticle Stickiness Falloff Distance, 15 Aim Assist, +2.7 degrees precision angle threshold, ~30% more Accuracy and ~30 Stability.
Bullets have a 100% chance to Ricochet off of Surfaces.
25 Stability and -10%(?) Accuracy Cone Size for 0.6 seconds.
[Controller-Only] Weapon fires the instant trigger pressure is applied.
Splits 55% of Damage into an Explosive Damage portion that has a 30% Damage Increase and no damage falloff. Detonates after X seconds.
[PVE] 16% Increased Body Shot Damage. Precision Damage Increase varies depending on Crit Ratio.
Bullets are able to penetrate up to 1 enemy.
After Reload within X seconds of Weapon Kills:
10% Increased Magazine Capacity per kill. Maxes out at 50% increased Magazine Capacity.
Grants Class Ability Energy based on the amount of damage taken.
No known method to calculate the amount, it is too inconsistent.
15% Magazine Reloaded from Reserves, ~20 Stability and ~25 Handling.
Automatically queues up the next shot after firing if you hold the trigger.
10% Faster Rate of Fire on Shotguns.
Other weapons do not receive a Rate of Fire Increase.
After Blocking a Melee Attack within 0.5(?) seconds of starting to Block:
Suppresses and Weakens the enemy, granting a 20% Damage Increase for 4 seconds.
Randomly increases Magazine Capacity between 10% to 50%. Always rounds magazine up.
50% Damage Increase, X Reload Speed, and 30 Handling for 5 seconds OR 3 shots.
Reduces the Maximum Recoil Angle (Maximum Horizontal Recoil), removes Reticle Bounce, and reduces Weapon Shake
*Noticeable mostly on controllers, as their reticle bounce on fire, akin to MGs on MnK*
Weapon Kills create an Elemental Explosion.
20 Range, 50 Mobility, 40 Handling, 30% reduced ADS Movement Penalty, and a 1.05x Damage Falloff Distance Multiplier
Lasts 6 seconds, additional kills add 6 seconds, maxing out at 8 seconds.
On Reload, within 3.8 seconds of a Weapon Kill:
17% | 33% | 50% Damage Increase, depending on the amount of enemies killed within X seconds of each.
Buff is overwritten every time you refresh it.
After being scoped-in for 1.5 seconds without firing:
X Range, Y% increased Accuracy, and increased Precision Damage for one shot.
(Verify range someday, no box scout to test)
Powered Swords gain 1 Ammo every other kill.
First Kill will proc this as well.
If All Pellets from a Shotgun Hit:
350% Melee Damage Increase against Bosses and Vehicles.
80% Melee Damage Increase if combined with Liar's Handshake.
Primary/Heavy Weapon Kills grant an additional 1% Super Energy.
Special Weapon Kills grant an additional 1.5% Super Energy.
[PVP] Weapon Kills grant an additional 1% Super Energy.
Weapon Kills increase Reload Speed for 3.5 seconds.
5% Faster Projectile Speed when ADS. god this is so bad
Zoom acts as a multiplier to hipfire range and maximum falloff distance. Range stat affects accuracy and the minimum drop off distance.
After being scoped-in for 1 second without firing:
Stacks multiplicatively with Unflinching Armor Mods.
45 Reload Speed with 0.8x Multiplier and 0.8x Ready/Stow Animation Duration Multiplier.
+30 Inventory Size. (Ammo Reserves, they're very weird)
Increases Explosive Damage by 0.63% for every metre past 10 metres, up to 25% at 50 metres.
After Reloading within 6 seconds of a Weapon Kill:
20 Aim Assist, 20% increased Accuracy and Y to ADS Handling (With a small Duration Scalar) for 5 seconds.
After Blocking an attack within 0.5(?) seconds of starting to Block:
Splits 50% of Damage into an Explosive Damage portion that has a
[PVE] 15% Body Shot Damage Increase. Precision Damage Increase varies depending on Crit Ratio.
[PVP] Total damage remains (almost) the same. I don't like decimals
After Reloading within 6 seconds of a Precision Kill:
Rate of Fire Increases to 600RPM for 7 seconds.
On Elemental or Barrier Champion's Shield Break:
Energy Weapons generate 1 Ammo against Matching Elemental Shields per hit
Starts Health Regeneration and heals for ~80HP after obtaining 3 points.
Rank-And-File give ONE point. Guardians give TWO points. Elites/Minibosses/Bosses give THREE points.
Weapon Kills must be within 8(?) seconds of each.
15% Magazine Reloaded from Reserves, 20 Range, and 30 Stability. Only buffs first shot (of the burst).
Lasts ~3 seconds. 0.3 Second Cooldown. Can activate multiple times per slide.
Grants 1 Stack of Explosive Light per Orb of Power Pickup. Max of 6
Wendigo: 70% Damage Increase and sets Blast Radius to 55(?).
Ascendancy & Hothead: 25% Damage Increase and sets Blast Radius to 100(?).
Grants a Stacking Damage Bonus Against High-Tier Minors, Elites, Minibosses, Bosses, and Vehicles.
Grants 1 Stack of Redirection on Lower Tier Minor Hits.
Stacks are consumed by 1 when between 1x-4x and by 5 when between 5x-20x.
Explosion disorients enemies within 7 metres for 5 seconds
Refeshes stowed weapon from reserves after 3 seconds.
Refresh = Reload, but does not need animation and doesn't proc on-reload perks.
20% Chance to generate 1 Ammo to Magazine.
On Reload within 6 seconds of a Weapon Kill:
Splits 50% of Damage into an Explosive Damage portion that has a
[PVE] 15% Body Shot Damage Increase. Precision Damage Increase varies depending on Crit Ratio.
[PVP] Total damage remains (almost) the same. I don't like decimals
Precision Hits within 2.5 seconds generate 1 Ammo to Magazine.
Reloads Magazine from Reserves based on the Number of Hits.
Grants 5-22-50 Reload Speed, 5-15-25 Stability, and 10-25-50 Handling depending on the amount of Charged Abilities.
Max x3. Each Ability Charge contributes to this. Works with double Ability Charges.
Grants different Stat Bonuses based on your selected Subclass.
: 20 Recoil Direction & 5% reduced ADS Movement Speed Penalty
20% Chance to generate 1 Ammo to Magazine.
Using your Grenade Ability refreshes Magazine. 3 Second Cooldown.
Refresh = Reload, but does not need animation and doesn't proc on-reload perks.
Grants 7.5% Ability Energy split equally to all uncharged abilities.
*BUGGED WITH ABILITIES THAT POSSESS MULTIPLE CHARGES*
Damage Increase and Slower Rate of Fire/Charge Time for 5 seconds.
Picks up the Ammo and Reloads all your Weapons from Reserves.
Triggers Ammo Pickup effects. 4 second Cooldown.
Surrounded Spec increases Damage by an additive 10% and adds a linger effect for 1.5 seconds
All Weapons are granted 100 Handling for 4(?) seconds. (Identical to Quick Access Sling)
Only availabe in Season 3's Trials of the Nine Weapons.
Explode the target, dealing the Weapon's Elemental Damage over a 3 metre radius. Damage is not increased by Weapon Perks.
Dragonfly Spec increases Damage and Radius by 50%.
Rockets attach on impact and detonate after 3 seconds, dealing an additional 20% Explosive Damage.
After Damaging 3 Separate Enemies within 3 seconds of each:
If within 15 metres of an enemy: ~15 Stability, 15 Reload, and 0.75x Handling Animation Duration Multiplier.
If within 15 metres of 2+ enemies: ~40 Stability, 55 Reload, and 0.56x Handling Animation Duration Multiplier.
Buff Refreshed on Kill. Melee Kills grant all 5 Stacks instantly.
After being in Combat for 12 seconds:
15% Damage Increase, 50(?) Handling, and 50 Reload Speed.
Lasts until you're out of combat.
It's technically a "state" so it works when stowed, and it also applies to all of your weapons with Frenzy.
Being "In Combat" is defined as having either dealt or received damage within 5 seconds.
Automatically queues up the next shot after firing if you hold the trigger.
10% Faster Rate of Fire on Shotguns.
Other weapons do not receive a Rate of Fire Increase.
